item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 22, 2025 at 1:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (1393 points | 914 comments)

3. These years in Common Lisp: 2023-2024 in review (35 points | discuss)

8. Richard Feynman's blackboard at the time of his death (1988) (381 points | 203 comments)

23. I found a backdoor into my bed (796 points | 324 comments)
24. Ancient switch to soft food gave us overbite–the ability to pronounce 'f's,'v' (154 points | 104 comments)
25. Can you lose your native tongue? (2024) (77 points | 135 comments)
26. SVDQuant+NVFP4: 4× Smaller, 3× Faster FLUX with 16-bit Quality on Blackwell GPUs (43 points | 8 comments)
27. Suckless.org: software that sucks less (296 points | 177 comments)
28. Fly To Podman: a script that will help you to migrate from Docker (191 points | 101 comments)
29. 20 years working on the same software product (398 points | 139 comments)
30. Start a computer club in the place that you live (2023) (141 points | 51 comments)
